message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with reinforcement learning agents learning to solve multiple tasks in a domain, which is a common problem in machine learning. The paper proposes an optimization objective for learning reusable temporally extended actions (macros) and introduces a computationally tractable surrogate objective for finding such macros. The paper also proposes an exploration strategy that takes advantage of these macros. Given these factors, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.RO (Robotics), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.CV (Computer Vision).
